headline: 3 Must-Know Facts About Coinbase Before Buying the Stock
summary: Coinbase (NASDAQ: COIN) has been an extremely volatile stock, to say the least.  From the initial public offering in April 2021 through the end of 2022, it dropped a troubling 89%.  Despite the positive momentum recently, this top cryptocurrency stock has experienced gut-wrenching ups and downs.
